New Records: Australia set the highest-ever T20 international first powerplay score of 113/1 for the opening six overs
Key Match Events: Both Head and captain Mitchell Marsh bludgeoned the Scotland attack
Head and Marsh fell to Mark Watt in the seventh over
Josh Inglis was able to pick up the baton as his quick-fire unbeaten 28 helped earn Australia a seven-wicket victory with 62 balls to spare
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sean Abbott was the pick of the Australia bowlers with three for 39
